#summary Charges - Pictures of things

=Description=

The tables below list all of the charges available. The _features_ column shows parts of the charge
that can be given a different tincture, and also shows whether there is a default or proper tincture
available. The _other_ column shows additional ways in which the charge can be modified.

WARNING! Do not edit this file! It is automatically generated from program data.
